_header: When shall relief release my woe
Subjects: A longing for Death — one quatrain; death, longing for

BLRoy9Cii.Transcription:
Whan shall relyfe reles my woWhan shall my lyfe by dethe be
                    sesteWhan shall my happy hape be soThat my pore harte may come to
                    reste
BLRoy9Cii.Note:
Marginal inscription. Written in the hand of
                            Thomas Lower.
BLRoy9Cii.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.362.
